title: BCES01584-[The Last of Us][PS3]
description:
Game            The Last of Us
Developer(s)	Naughty Dog
Publisher(s)	Sony Computer Entertainment
Engine	        In-house engine 
                Havok
Released	WW June 14, 2013
                JP June 20, 2013
Genre	        Action-adventure, survival horror 
Mode(s)	        Single-player, multiplayer
CONSOLE         PS3
GAME REGION     BCES01584 (EUR)
---------------------------------------------------
This Backup Game is Copied & Uploaded By MaSsUp . 
The Game is tested On Rogero 4.50 v1.0 .
---------------------------------------------------
Due to the Large size of this game ..
I had to Split the big files..copy them, merge them back again ..
so it would be easy for you to install..
just Ignore the "Split" Logo shown on the game in multiman .
---------------------------------------------------
tools required for installation: 
1.A portable [NTFS] HDD.
2.A brain .
---------------------------------------------------
How To Install : 

1. Copy The File ( _BCES01584-[The Last of Us] ) to any portable [NTFS] HDD .
2. Plug the "HDD" into "PS3" and Launch "Multiman" .
3. Under "Multiman" navigate to "PFS Driver" then press "x".
4. After the portable "HDD" reboots .. Press "x" on "File Manager /mmOS".
5. Go To this Location : "PS3 Root > pvd_usb001".
6. Locate & Copy the game folder (_BCES01584-[The Last of Us]). 
7. Paste the copied folder to this Location : "PS3 Root > dev_hdd0 > Games" .
8. Launch the game and Enjoy.
---------------------------------------------------
Note : this Game doesn't require "BD Mirror" setting to work .
---------------------------------------------------
To enable "BD Mirror" Setting : 
1. Launch "Multiman" .
2. Navigate to the game you want to enable "BD Mirror" then press "Square".
3. Under The "Game Cover" Navigate to "BD Mirror" and Press "X" .
